mapper.select: SELECT /* TeamMapper.getTeamsByGameId */ team_id, location, mascot, abbreviation, game_id FROM team WHERE game_id = #{id} ORDER BY location
SELECT /* TeamMapper.getTeamById */ team_id, location, mascot, abbreviation, game_id FROM team WHERE team_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* TeamMapper.createTeam */ team (game_id, location, mascot, abbreviation) VALUES ( #{gameId}, #{location}, #{mascot}, #{abbreviation} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* TeamMapper.updateTeam */ team SET location = #{location}, mascot = #{mascot}, abbreviation = #{abbreviation}, game_id = #{gameId} WHERE team = #{teamId}
